gameOver

public void gameOver()
gameOver: This method is to be called when the ending game state has been reached. It will reflect this call back to the main application for a custom response.

Specified by:
gameOver in interface StrategoGame

putBackDraggedPiece

public void putBackDraggedPiece()
putBackDraggedPiece: This method would be called when the user tries to place a dragged piece into an occupied cell or to an illegal location, like outside the panel.

resetPieceBeingDragged

public void resetPieceBeingDragged()
resetPieceBeingDragged: This method resets the piece that is being dragged to nothing. This method should be called when changing state to no piece being dragged.

updateDraggedPiece

public void updateDraggedPiece(int x,
                               int y)
updateDraggedPiece: This method allows us to move the location of the piece being dragged for rendering purposes. Note that it will not permit us to drag the piece off the panel.

Parameters:
x -
y -
